titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the A Toast to Yost from coast to coast [sound recording].

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: A Toast to Yost from coast to coast [sound recording].

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Use copy contains the entire recording, including the 3 discs missing from MHC copy, as well as appended recordings of University of Michigan songs, not related to the Toast to Yost.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Ann Arbor, Mich. : Matrix Recording Studios, [1940].

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Some discs made by Champion Recording Corp., New York.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Accompanied by log relating speakers and discs to cassettes.

archdesc.scopecontent: Dinner to celebrate University of Michigan football coach Fielding H. Yost on his retirement. Includes Michigan songs, speeches by alumni, political figures, and students, and speech by Yost.
